thread.title: Cranberry approves final budget with no tax hike | Front Page | thederrick.com
thread.title_full: Cranberry approves final budget with no tax hike | Front Page | thederrick.com

author: HELEN FIELDING Staff writer
title: Cranberry approves final budget with no tax hike | Front Page | thederrick.com
text: The Cranberry Township supervisors unanimously approved the final township budget with no tax increase at their last regular meeting of the year on Thursday.
